title: Bandwidth: GeForce Now finds Lost Ark, Luna and Xbox confirm latest additions
content:
This marks another week where streaming services are working hard to get as many titles as possible on their platform. GeForce Now is bringing the big guns and making Lost Ark available for its subscribers, while Amazon Luna and Xbox Game Pass are adding some truly enticing titles to their growing catalogs. Here’s what’s new.

more…

The post Bandwidth: GeForce Now finds Lost Ark, Luna and Xbox confirm latest additions appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: GeForce Now is bringing the heat with Lost Ark while Amazon Luna and Xbox Game Pass continue to push out new titles for gamers to enjoy.
